p: Edema formation may be caused by overhydration of the zebrafish embryo due to osmoregulatory system problems related to toxicant accumulation [ 37]. Cardiac edema was observed in this study ( Figure 4(A2,B2,B3,C2,C3)), and most embryos exhibited cardiovascular abnormalities, including a reduction of heart rate ( Figure 5B) similar to previous reports [ 38].
